original_title: Sri Lanka awaiting announcement from OCC on bilateral debt
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka is awaiting an announcement from the official creditor committee on debt restructuring, Treasury Secretary Mahinda Siriwardana said.
Sri Lanka has been continuing discussions with the official creditor committee after reaching agreement with China.
“You will hear the outcome very soon,” Siriwardana told the Sri Lanka Economic Summit, organized by the Ceylon Chamber of Commerce Wednesday.
President Ranil Wickremesinghe said Tuesday that a Paris Club response was expected ‘very shortly’.

Sri Lanka had been sent a preliminary restructuring plan by the official creditor committee made up of Paris Club and India which had to be evaluated and feed back sent according to multiple official sources. (Colombo/Nov28/2023)
